website_summaries.verdict: Rounded edges and a low surface temperature make this heater a good choice for families or kids' bedrooms.
pros: Adjustable thermostat and multiple heat settings.Manual controls
Anti-freeze setting lets unit automatically turn itself on when the temperature drops below 44°F

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: Unpacked the heater Friday and started leaking oil on Sunday morning.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McIlrath

customer_reviews.title: Heater Made Loud Clicking Sounds
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this heater because I wanted a heater that would operate silently while I sleep. The heater I purchased was sold by OJCommerce on Amazon.com. The heater I received made loud clicking sounds when heating up and cooling down. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Joodi

customer_reviews.title: This heater is way too noisy, it produces loud ...
customer_reviews.text: This heater is way too noisy, it produces loud popping sounds all the time not allowing you to rest properly.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Botinas

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm
customer_reviews.text: I leave this on 24/7, it keeps my open living room between 68-70 degrees when the temps are around 30 degrees outside. Initially it will have a smell and crackling noise, but both goes away with time. If you turn on and off the radiator, you will initially hear the crackling noise, but it will go away. It's super quiet and does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: This heater works great. I work from home and it keeps my ...
customer_reviews.text: This heater works great. I work from home and it keeps my office space warm without being too hot. I would definitely recommend it over the smaller tower or desk heaters.
customer_reviews.author: Tami H.

customer_reviews.title: NO INSTRUCTIONS
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are non-existent. I have no idea how the comfort setting works. Is it set to 70 degrees by the factory? Do I have to set it somehow? Does it override the manual control knob? I have no idea. Nice heater with no clue about how to operate it!
customer_reviews.author: Stinkfoot

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1000 square foot bungalow with old electric cadet heaters that cost a small fortune to run during the winter in the Pacific Northwest. The layout of my home is quite open. I purchased two of these oil heaters. I placed one in the hallway which heats the hallway, 2 bedrooms and the bathroom. (With doors open of course.) The second I placed between the living area and the dining/kitchen. On setting #1 using minimum power these two heat my entire house evenly. And they are so quiet I cant even tell they are on.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Not like they used to make them
customer_reviews.text: I have an older model of this heater that still works great. However, this one does not get nearly as hot. In addition, the wheel base is very narrow and the slightest touch will cause this heater to fall on its side and slam onto the ground. You would think that products would get better with time. I am not sure why they have to take a good product and make it worse.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Works great Don't know how much electricity it uses but keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great Don't know how much electricity it uses but keeps our large basement fairly warm (with floor fan)
customer_reviews.author: Russell Peck

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1000sqft Apartment and I leave this on in the living room/kitchen area during the day. It really does warm up my apartment and it’s warming up half of my place to a comfortable temperature when I have it all the way turned on. I live in northwestern Washington so during the winter nights it’s typically below freezing. I am happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Shea Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: Description says It's " safe " then tell me why I burned my fingers on the side of it. Not a very safe product as it gets extremely hot on it's sides, especially the part you grab it from. I have a baby on the way so I would not recommend this product if you have kids as it gets really hot and it's not safe. I gave 1 star for heat as it's dangerous to the touch. My last one wasn't hot to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this heater
customer_reviews.text: Love this heater! keeping my dorm room nice and toasty. just make sure the outlet you use is not connected with any other appliances that use high amperage. it can pop the fuse.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Made in China. And that's what you get.
customer_reviews.text: Few parts fell off the face of this unit right out of the box. So sad Delonghi has gone to China to turn out to be junk.. Customer service is in far east as well and quite rude and unwilling to help..
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Peter

customer_reviews.title: Clean, odorless, consistent heat.
customer_reviews.text: When we moved to a home that is at 7100 feet we decided we needed an "extra" boost for the bedroom. This heater is terrific. I highly recommend radiant heat. It is a bit slower to heat the room up, however once it is on, it maintains the heat with less electricity and with much less "fuss". The high and low settings as well as the built-in thermostat work well. The is a substantial unit, so if you are planning on moving it from room to room, be aware that it is on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.author: carlsbad4ever

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd DeLonghi, very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these when I lived in Europe. It was great for nearly 10 years and had a strong re-sale when I sold it before I moved back to the USA. These are reliable, efficient, and safe (i.e. it's not going to start a fire). Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Roundle

customer_reviews.title: little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It's an OK radiator, I purchased it recently on 10/2019, the area where you grab the heater to move it is not really indented or hollow which makes it very uncomfortable to move; plus it is hard to move when hot. The comfort button (big green button) seems cheap quality and is too loose very difficult and hard to press, so to adjust it you need to touch the hot radiator.
customer_reviews.author: Arguello02

customer_reviews.title: Brand name quality
customer_reviews.text: After returning one Dead On Arrival space heater, I picked up this unit. After a slight delay in shipping due to Thanksgiving, it arrived double boxed by Amazon in perfect condition. It warms up quickly and silent in operation, very happy to chose a brand name product over the DOA none brand junk.
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: Click Click Click
customer_reviews.text: It looks like the old one I used to have. Heats up well and stays at temp. My only complaint is the thing clicks loudly when heat cycles on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Egnarts

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: A nice toasty heater, makes little to no noise unless you listen closely. The oil smell some have complained about smells more like fresh adhesives heating up, smell fades significantly after about 5-6 hours of continuous use, and after about a month it's negligible. Keep in mind that this is a more energy efficient way of heating with electricity, but doesn't provide the direct warmth that an osculating heater might, but mine sits by my desk and does the trick, and if left on does indeed heat my room to an uncomfortably warm temperature.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Opened this stuff today and it’s not working.what a waste of money and loss of trust
customer_reviews.text: I just don’t understand why a product that costs so much money like this can’t produce heat
customer_reviews.author: Unaka S.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not cost effective
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of them. Provides even heat for a room. They are sturdy and well made. The comfort setting is way too hot, as it waits for a 10x10 room to get to 86°f before shutting off. My bill also skyrocketed with both of these set at Low-3.
customer_reviews.author: ItsBenReviewed

customer_reviews.title: Best heater ever
customer_reviews.text: Heats supper well, you can have it on low heat (with one switch on) or high heat (with both switches on) it also has a number dial and it's completely silent. Absolutely great buy and I highly recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, good amount of heat
customer_reviews.text: I placed this in the garage for a few hours when we first got it and put it on max settings. The smell was noticeable but gone after a few hours. Used it only a few times since then but heats well and no smell or sounds as others have mentioned in reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Anokh

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, find a good one.
customer_reviews.text: No auto shut off timer or thermostat control to shut off at a set temp, garbage, too lazy to return, thanks for nothing "DeLonghi"
customer_reviews.author: JMathInteractive

customer_reviews.title: OK if you don't move it
customer_reviews.text: Works well for a small space, but one of the plastic feet that where the rollers attach broke easily after a couple of months so now it doesn't sit straight. I move mine between 2 rooms, so maybe that caused the problem, but still... I would not expect that to cause any breakage!
customer_reviews.author: Panelist

customer_reviews.title: Set It and Forget It
customer_reviews.text: My first Delonghi radiator later for decades and was still working perfectly when I found a new home for it. When I needed a space heater again, I didn't even consider any other type. They just work silently and reliably and safely for decades. End of tune.
customer_reviews.author: SLansingAZ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned mine for over two years and it still works great. I live in San Francisco so I use this intermittently year round. I purchased mine from Amazon as a refurbished product and despite this it has held up splendidly.
customer_reviews.author: Helen H.

customer_reviews.title: Great heater and great shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Great heater, ample heating capability. Use it in a small bedroom 10x10. I use it for the winter time to keep my parakeets warm when I lower the heat on our downstairs level. Does a great job keeping the room at a nice comfortable temp. Great shipping as well.
customer_reviews.author: chander

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell of kerosene!!!
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses of this product it began to smell like kerosene!! If you are using in an enclosed room, beware - you will not be able to breathe!!
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterini Polychronopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Great product, unfortunate noise.
customer_reviews.text: It works really well but it makes a sound everytime it starts running to keep the temperature stable. The sound is loud enough to wake me up a few times during the night. It also wakes up my baby daughter. We are keeping it because it is better than our central heating system at keeping the room warm. The noise is a high pitch click that some people might not care about.
customer_reviews.author: Giselle Mendes

customer_reviews.title: Great heater - highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Heats my basement up REALLY well. Soo love it. It’s sturdy and has been reliable. I’m confused about The minimum frost setting. If I put the dial on the frost setting and switch on the I switch then it makes my basement too warm. I absolutely do recommend this product. This is my second winter and already it’s made itself invaluable.
customer_reviews.author: Aj17

customer_reviews.title: solid perfromer
customer_reviews.text: Heats up quick for an sealed oil heater. easy to set up, Not for temperatures at 50 and below, for safety it never became so hot i thought I would burn. This is my third Delonghi. My second was permanetly borrowed by my mother, its 10 years old and working fine. I look forward to another long lasting heater
customer_reviews.author: shakespeare

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy for a large room
customer_reviews.text: We renovated our downstairs (basement) which was heated and cooled, but it was still very cold so we got this heater. Our new den does have 9’ ceilings, but this little guy does very little. If you sit right next to it, you can feel some heat, but that is about it.
customer_reviews.author: EvelynSM

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: We had an old one of these that belonged to my mother and she always raved about it. We moved to the mountains and the owner of the home we purchased had one in each bedroom. He did not want to part with them so we decided to make the purchase and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: james lazelle

customer_reviews.title: Puts off good heat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace two smaller radiator heaters. We use this as supplemental heat since we have a heat pump, and well the heat coming out is awful on the coldest of nights. This manages to keep about 600 sq feet pretty comfortable in the highest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed, well made product. As with all oil-filled heaters, it takes awhile to heat up, but once it does it silently radiates warmth. We use it in the evenings in a large high ceilinged room, and it makes the room comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: hmbmartha

customer_reviews.title: Great heater!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this heater. We use it in a ground level living room that has a slate flooring which is prone to get cold in the winter months. It really provides a constant, quiet heat that took this room from being chilly to a very comfortable place for our children to play.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Won't Work
customer_reviews.text: Unboxed unit and plugged it it-nothing-unit was "dead". Apparently there is no power getting to the unit. Tried several different electrical outlets to be sure-same result. Fault is with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Simonsen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Heater
customer_reviews.text: This heater really heats up the room. I've had one in my large garage (17'x30' with 16' ceiling) all winter and it heats it up very well.
customer_reviews.author: L26.2

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my brother he's been sick lately and he loves it makes him comfortable no issues
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hazen

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried several different heaters, all different types. We were thoroughly impressed with this unit. The quickness it hearted the room and how warm it got. We often found ourselves getting up to turn it down or off...we liked it so much we bought a second unit for our spare room. Highly, highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Milam

customer_reviews.title: Save your money buy something cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Hard to move around . .doesnt roll smoothly ...the area were you are supposed to grab it is way to small and is too hot when heater is on...it should not get hot. .the older model seems way better quality .this one cost more but the design and size seem cheap ...low quality...I was expecting a better made heater..
customer_reviews.author: leslie castle

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and effective heater
customer_reviews.text: Great small heater for efficient heating of a room. Decent controls. Heats up quickly and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: I. Toner

customer_reviews.title: Clicks all the time
customer_reviews.text: I’ve just purchased two of these. I installed one in my bedroom. The thing keeps clicking all the time. No way to have a fair sleep.
customer_reviews.author: LuisJ

customer_reviews.title: sorry...this heater is NOT THAT STRONG...!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 heaters from the same brand...i got this one HOWEVER is not very strong...you need to get very close to it.. (sorry..but the old ones work a lot better and they are very strong...NOT this model...i am very confuse...the main reason i follow the same brand is because the other are EXCELLENT....!!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small space
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed to keep the salon in our boat warm.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Very good for warming a small enclosed space like a bathroom. Rolls easily on casters, might be difficult with thick carpet.
customer_reviews.author: justannesopinion

customer_reviews.title: The wheels fold out and in. Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this up in NY in the cold. After use I can store in the box by folding the wheels in. Great when used occasionally then stored
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very very good heater
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Safe heat..not instant heat, but quality heat. Warm radiating heat, wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Tech User

customer_reviews.title: Safe for dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is a good heater. We have 3 dogs, so we like how safe it is. It has this green button control which can be turned on or off. It is suppose to make it more efficient, but not sure about that. It is our 2nd DeLonghi heater and we are satisfied with both.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Green

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Heats the room that you're in quickly. Healthy heat compared to forced air.
customer_reviews.author: mtnbikie

customer_reviews.title: outstanding product , it’s Truly got all the w and everything’s
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product , it really puts out some extremely good and comforting heat For our whole family to enjoy and since we deserve the best we got this product !
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Drabowicz

customer_reviews.title: ENERGY REGULATING DEVICE
customer_reviews.text: GOOD design and controls. Need a deeper Cup or Carry Port. Put out heat totally efficient and superior! Quality Product to heat hallway/ bedroom.👍
customer_reviews.author: Ben Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Clearly previously used.
customer_reviews.text: Product was clearly USED. Marks on the housing and a twisted cord. Sold as NEW, not a deal stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Wexler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beater
customer_reviews.text: Great heat delivery, a tiny bit awkward to move, but an overall great investment for a relatively large area. Maybe 500ft.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not good
customer_reviews.text: After two month using this product, it's dead. It doesn't work any more. I will not recommend anyone to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: low quality product
customer_reviews.text: The cord get very hot within a short time of being plugged which tells me there is some risk for safety. Also, the heat does not radiate despite being turned on for a very long time as advertised . This product is not effective at all
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: I love this heater
customer_reviews.text: I have sliding glass doors in my bedroom. On really cold nights we needed just a little more heat in the room without turning up the heat for the whole house. This did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Cain

customer_reviews.title: Silent heater!
customer_reviews.text: It is only a little mysterious to figure out heating levels. Keep instructions!
customer_reviews.author: GloryBe

customer_reviews.title: Great heater. Energy saving. Works Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It's my second same heater that I bought because it's really good once it start heating up the space. It is energy saving also if you keep the area close.
customer_reviews.author: RUTHY SANCHEZ

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Simple, easy to use, and warms up a small room easily (~110 sq ft). Pretty much everything I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Yilok Wong

customer_reviews.title: PASS ON THIS ONE
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, simply horrible. Takes a very long time to feel the heat. A small heater with a fan is far better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Silent and practical
customer_reviews.text: It’s practical, it’s completely silent and if kept near you, pretty warm Not sure about temp control yet though but my room is pretty big
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Choices in Heat Output
customer_reviews.text: Although there is some variation in temperature, it is mostly set it and forget it. Hard to move on carpet when it is hot.
customer_reviews.author: Ron98642

customer_reviews.title: Kicks ass
customer_reviews.text: Ran it all winter 24/7, green light on comfort temp went out but still works
customer_reviews.author: jake leach

customer_reviews.title: Best quality
customer_reviews.text: I own two and bought two for my aunt is St. Louis . Makes a big difference
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Gives good heat
customer_reviews.text: Great heater for medium sized room. No noise and no smells. I wish the electrical cord was longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Very hot
customer_reviews.text: Hot! I bought it because others viewers said it was safe around children but it does get hot to touch and will burn little fingers
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Wood

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: We have a rather large basement and this heater keeps it comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Great heater
customer_reviews.text: Really great heater. Kept my living room and kitchen warm.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie M.

customer_reviews.title: Thermostat function doesn't work! Do not buy tbjs
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this heater, the thermostat doesn't work and there is no way to keep it at a constant temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Holt

customer_reviews.title: The buzz about the click sound is invalid
customer_reviews.text: Too much said, but really, you bearly hear that sound.
customer_reviews.author: Yiannis Laouris

customer_reviews.title: Great heater!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great heater. Easy to use, quiet and lots of heat. When I need another heater I'll get another just like it.
customer_reviews.author: PATSY H RAY

customer_reviews.title: Works as billed
customer_reviews.text: Holds the temperature you want without using full power. Great for a tack room
customer_reviews.author: John Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Solid performance
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for two months and I am very satisfied with the product and the consistency in temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Does not blow heat , it’s radiant heat
customer_reviews.text: Heats the downstairs a little but it plays a huge part in heating the upstairs
customer_reviews.author: John Warters

customer_reviews.title: Heats more than one room
customer_reviews.text: For me, it works better than I expected. Better than what the advertisement said.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We use it next to a baby crib and we feel that this is a good and safe way to control the temperature around the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Covers a large area and the heat is very pleasant. We use it next to a baby crib and we feel that this is a good and safe way to control the temperature around the baby's crib at night. Not 5 stars because of price and clicking sounds.
customer_reviews.author: keren

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Updated version of the previous model. We have both. So far no issues and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Eilsel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: As expected, works well and lighter than previous year product.
customer_reviews.author: Vesta L.

customer_reviews.title: Smelly at start-up
customer_reviews.text: Horrific chemical smell first hour of use so far. update 24 hours later: Returning since smell has not dissipated at all. Factory needs to turn on and cycle these when they are new for a few days after making them so the customer does not get nauseated from the fumes. Children and adults with respiratory issues, i advise you avoid this one unless you can let it run its "burn off" stage in a ventilated room or garage.
customer_reviews.author: Dromodor

customer_reviews.title: Confusing instructions can make this dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: I've never used an oil filled heater before: but I have lived in houses with radiant heat. They are NOT the same! This heater has 3 separate controls: a thermostat rated 1-6, two toggles (move oil?), and the big button(?) I read the instructions and I'm still not clear on the relationship between these systems. Anyway, I managed to crank the thing up until it was almost 300°f, and then burned my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Abdy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - Pay Attention to the Green Button
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this unit and did the job. One point I'd like to make - there is a button on the front that lights up green. If that is on, it does not listen to the temperature and tries to make the room comfortable. While that is fine, your idea of comfort is not always the same as mine and I wanted something to complement another heater. Once I found that , it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Ken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product. Works really good and covers a large area.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Brown

customer_reviews.title: It takes the chill off the cold air quickly
customer_reviews.text: I do like the quick warmth it provides. I disliked all the warnings. Ie, disconnect when not in use. Do not leave unattended. I also dislike that the thermostat does not really work. I can put it at the lowest setting and it does not turn on and off as expected. When it gets too warm in the room I have to turn it off. It is nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Westcott

customer_reviews.title: Takes the chill out of the deep freeze!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of mixed reviews, but trust the manufacturer name. Straight out of the box, plugged into the wall, and my living room feels better in the hour. However, I do find the metal hot to the touch, and there were two pops as it was warming up. Time will tell, but it seems to be what it claims.
customer_reviews.author: Momomom

customer_reviews.title: Works as needed
customer_reviews.text: It works good at radiating heat. You can't plug in these types of units and expect quick head out-put, but they do work to quietly keep your home warm. The energy option works great for warmer (60+) days or at night to keep the chill out. Hoping they are easier on the electric bill than other ceramic units.
customer_reviews.author: Live wild - live free

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a 1998 DeLonghi heater and it works fantastic. Very safe radiant heat source
customer_reviews.author: polaris1

customer_reviews.title: Comfort-temp is pointless
customer_reviews.text: I got this for an unheated basement room of about 12 x 12. It heats the space nicely, but it cam be frustrating to dial in a good temperature. There are two heat level switches, plus a dial, and then the useless green button. Getting the temp you want is kind of a crapshoot.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Hot Radiator!
customer_reviews.text: Over all, I like the product. I would prefer a dial over the two switches to regulate the temperatures. The unit gets very hot and can hurt little kids if they touch it. One side has a handle that stays cool but the rollers do not roll very good on carpet and therefore I have to touch the other end of the unit which is hot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great for taking a chill out of a room for extra comfort... very safe....
customer_reviews.text: works great for taking a chill out of a room for extra comfort... very safe....
customer_reviews.author: JakRaft

customer_reviews.title: Consistent heat
customer_reviews.text: Good for large rooms. Doesn't heat immediately, but will warm if settings aren't "jacked about with". Once it has been running consistently at lowest setting, the room will get rather warm. Cracking the window helps and doesn't chill the room overall. Very happy with this heater for big and small rooms. rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Tried and tested twice already. This is my third purchase in 10 years. So far all of them are working fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. CHITKARA

customer_reviews.title: Best Room Heater
customer_reviews.text: These are the best heaters. This is the only brand I will buy. They put out great heat!
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the heating arsenal in our house
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my mother in law. It work well in a small space. Found the same heater for $40 less at Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy and complex to return. The heater never responded. Per internet, there is a reset switch hidden deep within the unit. We tried to flip this switch. No response.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Einstein

customer_reviews.title: Smell
customer_reviews.text: I got for my small office. My workers said that is produces a mild smell of sort, but not as much as a newer model TRD40615. But this one is harder to operate. Controls surprisingly tricky and its manual is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really give sufficient heat for my 12x15 Room
customer_reviews.text: First the cord to too short, It makes clicking sounds, and when you want to move it, it has one small slot to place your hand it order to move it. Makes the heater dangerous to move it will fall over. I would not recommend this heater.
customer_reviews.author: john orlando

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement heat.
customer_reviews.text: Works well in a 200 square foot room as supplement heat. Best if it has it's own 20 amp outlet though. Has tripped my breaker a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Vsard

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Keeps a bedroom nice and toasty for my teen w a chilly bedroom Wheeled feet just snap up into place. Works great
customer_reviews.author: JoJoBee

product_meta.title: De'Longhi Oil-Filled Radiator Space Heater, Quiet 1500W, Adjustable Thermostat, 3 Heat Settings, Energy Saving, Safety Features, Nice for Home with Pets / Kids, Light Gray, Comfort Temp KH390715CM
product_meta.description: Color:Light Gray - Comfort TempEffectively and efficiently heat any room of the house with the redesigned De'Longhi ComforTemp portable oil-filled radiator. Worried about your electric bill? This heater actually saves you money by automatically maintaining the optimal room temperature. Simply press the ComforTemp button for the ultimate in energy savings. The heater even produces the maximum amount of radiant heat while ensuring a low surface temperature, making the radiator a nice choice for homes with pets or kids. The user-friendly control panel offers an adjustable thermostat and three heat settings to customize your heating needs. The anti-freeze setting allows the unit to automatically turn itself on when the temperature drops below 44 degrees F. Safety highlights include rust-resistant durable metal construction, a gently rounded design, and a thermal cut-off function that automatically turns the heater off if it starts to overheat. With its sleek look and silent operation, the De'Longhi oil-filled radiator is the perfect solution to all your heating needs.
feature_bullets: LOWER ENERGY BILLS: By heating only the room you’re in, you can lower your thermostat and lower your energy bills.
SAFETY TECHNOLOGY: Perfect for family use, De’Longhi safety features include a thermal shut off that prevents overheating.
NO ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Only De’Longhi has patented SmartSnap pre-assembled wheels that require no assembly and make it easy to move from room to room.
COMFORT TEMP TECHNOLOGY: Cuts your costs by automatically maintaining the optimal temperature and power settings.
MAINTENANCE FREE SYSTEM: The oil system is permanently sealed, so you never need to worry about refilling the heater.
PERSONALIZED COMFORT: Adjustable thermostat and multiple heat settings ; Heating power - Max (W): 1500 Heating power - Med (W): 800 Heating power - Min (W): 700
